page.title: 01A QUICK LOOK AT OUR AREA.
page.content: In our area there are lots of housing estates and public amenities. People living in{BELLE VALE}live in small,tidy,terraced houses.There is a park & baths. We also have a large shopping centre.This is a massive structure with lots of shops inside. The{CRAIGHURST ESTATE}has quite old houses.The shops nearby have graffiti scrawled on their walls.There is a lot of litter and most of the shops are boarded up. { In the{GATEACRE ESTATE}people live in very large,expensive,detached houses. Most of the people who live here enjoy a good standard of living. {CHILDWALL}is an area of mostly privately owned semi-detached houses. In the area there are several parks such as Reynolds & Calderstones,the latter being the most attractive with a lake, gardens and a nature trail.
